scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:css" "bun run dev:js"
scripts.dev:css: concurrently "postcss styles/index.css -o dist/css/index.css --map --watch" "postcss styles/vs-dark.css -o dist/css/vs-dark.css --map --watch" "postcss styles/vs-light.css -o dist/css/vs-light.css --map --watch"
scripts.build: bun run build:css && bun run build:js
scripts.build:css: NODE_ENV=production postcss styles/index.css -o dist/css/index.css && NODE_ENV=production postcss styles/vs-dark.css -o dist/css/vs-dark.css && NODE_ENV=production postcss styles/vs-light.css -o dist/css/vs-light.css
